spec_data.Name: node-gyp
spec_data.Description:
node-gyp is a cross-platform command-line tool written in Node.js for compiling
native addon modules for Node.js, which takes away the pain of dealing with the
various differences in build platforms. It is the replacement to the node-waf
program which is removed for node v0.8.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 01:45:58 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
